data.title: CommQuest
data.text:
Alliance Outpatient

1207 W. State St. Ste F & M | Alliance, OH | 330.821.8407

Withdrawal Management

2600 6th St. SW | Canton, OH 44710 | 330.830.3393

Withdrawal management services and Medication-Assisted Treatment. Enter through Aultman Hospital ER and ask for CommQuest Withdrawal Management.

Site Hours

Around-the-clock care for those enrolled

Walk-In Assessment Hours

Mon – Fri: 7 AM – 6 PM

Sat & Sun: 8 AM – 4 PM
